title: Magic Spells & Sorcery
description: Cutting Edge Magic Sound Effects including Magical Spells, Massive Fire Bursts and Flame Swirls, Ice, Water, Wind, Earth, Electric Bursts, and more!
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo: https://soundcloud.com/soundresponse/magic-spells-sorcery-demo


With Magic Spells & Sorcery sound library Sound Response brings you nine different categories of high quality magic sound effects to choose from! Whether you need those sparkling and shimmering magical spells, buffs, bursts, whooshes and casts sound effects, or the sounds of massive fireballs, fire swooshes, flames and whirls, earth, water, air, ice, powerful electric bursts, chimes, or drones, this magical sound effects collection will provide you with audio arsenal that will instantly find a way into your production!


Magic Spells & Sorcery sample pack is a result of months of stage and field recording with high-end recorders and microphones, and meticulous sound design process afterwards. Perfect for video games, movies, trailers, videos, but also very useful for music producers, and pretty much anyone whoâ€™d like to expand sound collection with various exotic magical & fantasy buffs, whooshes, transitions and bursts sound effects!


Magic Spells & Sorcery Sound Effects List

Number of Audio Waves: 318

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Minutes of Audio Provided: 44.12 min
